title: Pogačar Blasts Social Media as ‘Cancer,’ Lamperti Makes Flanders Debut, Magnier Extends, Visma Unveils New Kit
content:
Pogačar rails against social media and says he's not racing for revenge or to carve his legacy by targeting Paris-Roubaix: 'When I retire, I will not have any regrets.'
